evidence.claim: EpiphanyRx utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, including Lambda and S3 for scalable functions and storage.
The platform offers FHIR APIs that facilitate the exchange of healthcare information and ensure compliance with HIPAA regulations.
Integration patterns include event-driven architecture using AWS Simple Notification Service (SNS) for real-time updates.
Data processing capabilities involve AWS Glue to create data pipelines for ETL processes.

icp.icp_reason: No specific mention of X12 transactions or clearinghouse capabilities found.
